jump_scares.spoiler: The scarecrow suddenly scares Ben
The camera pans around the tree-house and Robbie is suddenly in frame
Alex jumps in front of the webcam to scare Ben
Alex’s mum enters the house, scaring Alex
There is a whooshing noise as a figure moves past the screen while Alex is talking to Robbie
Ben pulls Alex off her bed while she is looking into her webcam
There is a bang as Alex walks towards her bedroom door
Wyatt’s toy train turns on
A chandelier falls from the ceiling and smashes in front of Alex. [Video]
A lady suddenly appears in front of Alex while she is spying on the neighbours at night
A book drops down in front of the camera
A knife drops down in front of the camera
The sheets are pulled off Alex’s bed suddenly
The garage door slams down suddenly, narrowly missing Alex
A book drops from the shelf
Holly is suddenly lifted off the ground and flung at the ceiling by an unseen force
There is a loud thump as Ben looks at the camera
Ben sits down at Alex’s laptop and Katie is suddenly standing behind him
Alex is flung back out of a doorway by an unseen force
Alex sees her dad being flung against a wall
Alex sees a large group of women approaching her, she turns around and is then attacked by the possessed Katie
